name: aerospike_namespace_objects
description: Number of records in this namespace for this node

name: aerospike_namespace_client_read_success
description: Number of successful client read commands

name: aerospike_namespace_client_write_success
description: Number of successful client write commands

name: aerospike_namespace_client_read_error
description: Number of read commands that failed with an error

name: aerospike_namespace_client_write_error
description: Number of client write commands that failed with an error

name: aerospike_namespace_memory_used_bytes
description: Amount of memory occupied by data

name: aerospike_namespace_data_used_pct
description: Percentage of used storage capacity for this namespace

name: aerospike_namespace_evicted_objects
description: Number of objects evicted from this namespace on this node since the server started

name: aerospike_namespace_stop_writes
description: If true, this namespace is currently not allowing client-originated writes

name: aerospike_namespace_clock_skew_stop_writes
description: Critical: Namespace will stop accepting client writes when true

name: aerospike_node_stats_client_connections
description: Number of active client connections to this node

name: aerospike_node_stats_cluster_size
description: Size of the cluster

name: aerospike_node_stats_cluster_is_member
description: When false, indicates that the node is not joined to a cluster; that is, it is an orphan

name: aerospike_node_stats_system_free_mem_pct
description: Percentage of free system memory

name: aerospike_node_stats_process_cpu_pct
description: Percentage of CPU usage by the asd process

name: aerospike_namespace_query_reqs
description: Number of query requests ever attempted on this node

name: aerospike_namespace_scan_basic_complete
description: Number of basic scans that completed

name: aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_active
description: Number of partitions currently emigrating from this node

name: aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_active
description: Number of partitions currently immigrating to this node

name: aerospike_xdr_ship_success
description: Number of records successfully shipped to remote Aerospike clusters

name: aerospike_xdr_lag
description: Lag in seconds between the destination and the source datacenters

name: aerospike_namespace_hwm_breached
description: If true, Aerospike has breached 'high-water-[disk|memory]-pct' for this namespace

name: aerospike_namespace_device_available_pct
description: Device available percentage - drops below 20% indicate defrag may not keep up with load

name: aerospike_namespace_memory_free_pct
description: Percentage of memory capacity free for this namespace

name: aerospike_namespace_dead_partitions
description: Number of dead partitions for this namespace

name: aerospike_namespace_unavailable_partitions
description: Number of unavailable partitions for this namespace (when using strong-consistency)
